name: House Surfing
description:
Quick, stay afloat! WASD to move, Spacebar to Jump

Be warned. This is a difficult game!

The city has flood, quick!  Try to stay afloat and on your roof as your house speedily sinks. But don't fret, you can collect barrels to help you keep afloat! How many barrels can you get before you sink?

Us Ghreelin Wizards, we all have quite busy lives. To combat this, a friend and I decided to do a 8 hour game jam to get back into game development!
We had a list that was triple the size of what we were actually able to implement! But that is the beauty of the game jam.

Game 3D model assets from http://kenney.nl
Music is an improvisation made by us.

Made by Ghreelin Wizards.
